title: Diary of a backpack
creator_contributor_role: Royal Children's Hospital and District Health Service Education Centre, partner
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/People with disabilities
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Psychology
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Physically handicapped - Travel
abstract: 'I am grotty and outdated by new lighter, high tech backpacks.'
description: Gabrielle Guaran's backpack tells of all the adventures taken with her owner, a woman with Turner's Syndrome. Depsite getting old, Guaran hasn't given up on her backpack, in much the same way she refuses to give up on the life she wants to lead.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2002121; Hidden treasure : thoughts about living with Turner's Syndrome : Digital Storytelling project; Active; 2006
